verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Through our God we shall do valiantly. It is He who will tread down the enemy. Weâ€™ll sing and shout His victory. Christ is King.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For God has won the victory and set His people free. His word has slain the enemy. The earth shall stand and see that Christ is King Christ is King.{/lang-eng}
